item.title: openai service
item.description: Overview OpenAI is a research and development organization that developed ChatGPT, among other models. Azure OpenAI Service is Microsoft’s Azure service that provides access to these models. Documentation: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/_net/getting-started-azure-openai-dotnet/ OpenAI Models Generative Pre-trained Transformers (GPT) — a model that can understand and generate writing and code. DALL-E — a model that can generate and edit images given a text description. Whisper — a model that can convert audio into text. Resources OpenAI Azure OpenAI Service Azure OpenAI .

item.title: app service
item.description: Overview An HTTP-based services for hosting web apps, REST APIs, and mobile back-ends. Features: Automatic scaling (horizontally and vertically) CI/CD (Azure DevOps, GitHub, Bitbucket, FTP, local Git repo) App Service Plans A set of compute resources for a web app to run. One or more apps can be configured on an app service plan Azure Functions can also run in an app service plan Deployments Deploy to Azure App Service:
